text: Stir Crazy is a 1980 American comedy movie directed by Sidney Poitier, produced by Hannah Weinstein and stars Gene Wilder, Richard Pryor, JoBeth Williams, Craig T. Nelson, and Barry Corbin. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures and was a major success led to the unsuccessful TV series by CBS in 1985. ==Other websites== * * Category:1980 comedy movies Category:1980s criminal comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies adapted into television series Category:Movies directed by Sidney Poitier Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in Arizona Category:Movies set in Utah
title: Stir Crazy (movie)
